```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(aloe)
```

## R Markdown


You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
params$rv
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
pal <- c("black", aloe:::intervention_colours["itn"])
names(pal) <- NULL
fill <- pal[ifelse(params$spatial[["spatial_id"]] %in% aloe:::implemented(params$rv, "itn"), 2, 1)]
aloe:::base_map(params$spatial, params$bbox) |>
  leaflet::addPolygons(
    data = params$spatial,
    stroke = TRUE,
    smoothFactor = 0.5,
    opacity = 1,
    fill = TRUE,
    weight = 1,
    color = ~ fill,
    layerId = ~ params$spatial[["spatial_id"]]
  )
```
